name: Nifty Tab
description: Nifty Tab provides you with everything you need to get your day running.
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' https://apis.google.com https://www.googleapis.com https://ff.search.yahoo.com https://logo-core.clearbit.com https://logo.clearbit.com https://icons.iconarchive.com/ https://ip-api.com https://use.fontawesome.com; object-src 'self'
